com.google.cloud.compute

Class Instance.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.cloud.compute.InstanceInfo.Builder
      • com.google.cloud.compute.Instance.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Instance

    public static class Instance.Builder
extends InstanceInfo.Builder
    A builder for Instance objects.

      • setCanIpForward

        public Instance.Builder setCanIpForward(Boolean canIpForward)
        Description copied from class: InstanceInfo.Builder
        Sets whether to allow this instance to send and receive packets with non-matching destination or source IPs. This is required if you plan to use this instance to forward routes.
        Specified by:
        setCanIpForward in class InstanceInfo.Builder
        See Also:
        Enabling IP Forwarding

      • setNetworkInterfaces

        public Instance.Builder setNetworkInterfaces(List<NetworkInterface> networkInterfaces)
        Description copied from class: InstanceInfo.Builder
        Sets a list of network interfaces. This specifies how this instance is configured to interact with other network services, such as connecting to the internet. At the moment, instances only support one network interface.
        Specified by:
        setNetworkInterfaces in class InstanceInfo.Builder

        Description copied from class: InstanceInfo.Builder

        Specified by:
        setNetworkInterfaces in class InstanceInfo.Builder

      • setAttachedDisks

        public Instance.Builder setAttachedDisks(List<AttachedDisk> attachedDisks)
        Description copied from class: InstanceInfo.Builder
        Sets a list of disks to attach to the instance. One boot disk must be provided (i.e. an attached disk such that AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration.boot() returns true).
        Specified by:
        setAttachedDisks in class InstanceInfo.Builder

      • setAttachedDisks

        Description copied from class: InstanceInfo.Builder

      • setServiceAccounts

        public Instance.Builder setServiceAccounts(List<ServiceAccount> serviceAccounts)
        Description copied from class: InstanceInfo.Builder
        Sets a list of service accounts, with their specified scopes, authorized for this instance. Service accounts generate access tokens that can be accessed through the metadata server and used to authenticate applications on the instance.
        Specified by:
        setServiceAccounts in class InstanceInfo.Builder
        See Also:
        Authenticating from Google Compute Engine
